item_category: With its 48 MP, AI-powered triple camera system, moto g pro captures outstanding shots in every situation. Whether it's sharper, brighter photos in low light, ultra-wide action videos, or detailed close-ups, moto g pro is all the camera you need. Want to edit your photos with pinpoint precision? Slide out the stylus to retouch an image or jot down a note. Moto g pro. You + perfection.
review_title: Camera fault on all of them
Really good features like the pen it comes with
My phone is great love the colour
Cheap phone with everything you want for daily use
Good looking phone for a great price
Great Price for an Android Phone
Poor screen colors,try settings no better, return
My moto phone is brilliant as good if not
Mostly great, though a bit long for my face!
Very nice features and really nicely designed phon
Good spec for phone at a reasonable price
review_text: Unbeatable for the cost. Great features as it's an Android One phone. Camera is above average. Stylus works good enough.

I got this and had to return it.
When switching to 60fps or slowmo
The cameras focus pops in and out.
But on this phone model, when you play the videos back, you can even hear the focus moving 

Contacted Motorola, but so far they don't seem to care
I got this phone as could not get the Samsung A51 to be fair I'm really happy with this not had a Motorola for years

Good price and a good phone. Does everything far higher-end phones do (fingerprint, face ID, contactless payment, even a stylus!!) for a very reasonable price. Responsive and quick, and easy to set up and use.
I like this phone every happy and I love  the colour
It works and the colour is beautiful.
Been using it for few weeks now, it has very good camera, battery last over a day for my usage which is more than enough. Kids love the stylus.
Very very good product

Spent 2 days and most of my phone credit, trying to update the phone. 
Had to return phone and get money back, just couldn't deal with the stress of it.

Keyboard Hard to type. 
Poor inty connection
Slow system
Mobile phone, sometimes deleted date and password
Great phone does everything that all recent phone's are required , cameras great also

Looks good. Works. Irritatingly kept telling me I needed to update the Motorola software and restart, several times a day for 1st week, but then it settled down. 
Camera is reasonable - again for a moderately inexpensive phone.
Excellent phone great improvement on my partners previous Hawai

It has some pretty cool features. Quick start for camera and torch. Fabulous at screenshots it captures the whole page if you need it to. Camera also has some cool features including a feature where if you show the palm of your hand it takes your selfie, not actually used camera that much yet, been at work alot lol. Comes with a stylus, the phone tells you when you last took it out so you can retrace steps if you lose it.

Needed to replace my aging moto 5 as only a 16g memory.
Very happy with this one 128 gb very fast, great camera's.
Even a stylus.
Very happy and would recommend

Great features for the price. Android Apps compatible. Works well and long battery life. Quite large screen for clarity - Advise buy carry case for protection as screen looks fragile and insurance excesses are ridiculously large at £50 - £75.

Good phone apart the quality of the screen , the colors are not like Samsung screens,
Returned and bought Samsung  a51 adding 100£ on top.
My  phone is brilliant can't fault it
As far as I know, it's brilliant.  He's still playing with it!

Updated from an older Moto and pleased with it. Fast, good screen, reasonable camera. Fingerprint sensor not so good. I need to get a case for protection because the clear case that comes with it is OK but, like many phones, it's quite smooth and easy to slip.

The phone is pretty nice and I love the the great cameras.  It took a while to get used to it from the Moto G, but when I found the stylus, it was a game changer for me.  I love it!!  I also like that the facial recognition works whether or not I have my glasses on.

My only issue with it now is that the phone is quite long and I have a small head.  I can't talk and listen well at the same time.  I have to move the phone up and down between my ear and mouth or  wear headphones.
The phone I received is a very nice looking phone and the features, camera and speed of the phone is really really good

Sing ...At first I was afraid I was petrified, kept thinking had a done the wrong thing leaving my old pixel behind, but then I hummed and arghed and now I realize that I was wrong, the Moto G can do no wrong, now I'm alive and I feel just great, I walk around all day and night flashing my phone up in the air, I could of stuck with pixel 2 I could of had another year but now I'm holding my Moto G, and I'm smiling from ear to ear.. Go on now Go walk out the door go buy!
Its fantastic priced phone with good specifications, ideal for teen aged kids.
SIM Free Motorola G Pro 128GB Mobile Phone is an upgrade on my G6 bought 3 years ago, I am sure that once I get used to using gestures it will prove to be excellent .

bought this phone for the speed of download and the additional little extra's that it has like the built in stylus and note taking capability, the blue colour also appealed to me as a little different from the norm.
it also comes with a plastic cover so no need to buy anything extra this is keeping it looking pristine and sharp, i like the additional screen size and video's play instantly on it. i haven't got my head around all of the features yet but it is a pleasure to use.

I bought it to replace my previous Motorola, which was cheap and worked but the memory was too small. This one is similar but updated with a much better memory. It costs more but I feel it is very good value, compared to other makes like Samsung.
